page.title: 17BERKELEY ESTATE
page.content: {Berkeley complex}comprises of a {housing estate}with various amenities and an{industrial estate}on which are sited 23 working companies. The housing estate including perimeter _ Ferry Rd, Scotter Rd, Doncaster Rd.Main road through the estate is Dewsbury Ave.16 other streets within the estate.Amenities other than schools are situated centrally to the housing estate on Marsden Drive. {Amenities}:Grocers,Newsagent,Butcher, Mini_Supermarket,Bakery,Fish & Chip shop,"Poacher"Public House,Doctor's Surgery,Telephone Box & Post Box.A regular{bus service}weaves its way through the estate .Details of houses:Detached=46 ;Semi_detached(prs. =376;Bungalows detached=7;Bungalows semi-detached(prs.)=115;Flats=8. There is a{Methodist Church}situated on Mirfield Road.
